page.title: 20LIFE STYLES
page.content:
{ COUNTRY LIFE I GET UP EARLY AND GO OUTSIDE TO SAY GOOD MORNING TO THE ANIMALS, THEN I GO INSIDE AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. AFTERWARDS I GO OUTSIDE AND LET ONE OF THE HORSES OUT.
I CANNOT PUT ALL THREE HORSES OUT BECAUSE ONE OF THE HORSES IS LIKELY TO TREAD ON MY FEET AND THE OTHER ONE GOES BONKERS.
I THEN HELP TO GET THE COWS OUT AND I CLEAN THE HORSES STABLES.
AFTER LUNCH I COLLECT THE EGGS FROM THE CHICKENS AND HELP DADDY SEE TO THE COWS.
WHEN THE WORK IS DONE I HAVE MY SUPPER AND GO TO BED.
